extendedInfo.description: The Lite Version provides full functionality except user can only save one property.  Also, Ads are featured in the lite version.  Upgrade to the full version for multiple properties and an ad free application.  Lite version credit available upon request if you decide to upgrade to the full version. Are you managing your real estate rental properties efficiently?The LandlordApp allows you to:* Track Rent Payments* Edit past and future Rents* Enter Rental Expenses and Repairs* Track Bills Paid* Mass Email or Text Tenants for invoices* Advertise Rentals Quickly on Craigslist* Track and illustrate Cash Flow for Each Property* Track Miles Driven* Maintain Tenant, Lease and Mortgage Information The Landlord App does everything you already do at home to manage your rental properties while keeping all the important information in your front pocket.  Struggling to capture tax data for your rental properties?  No problem.  All the data stored in the app is exportable to excel, making it easy to do an end of the year tax report.  This means data entered such as Miles driven, rents collected, expenses paid, supplies paid,  utilities paid are all stored in the app and are able to be exported when needed for taxes.  TheLandlordApp has 4 main functions, Property Summary, Financial Summary, Miles, Rentals Available, which are integrated into a native software package that will work harder than anyone on your team.    The Property Summary function allows you to input all of your rental property information to include rental income, deposits, lease dates, tenant information, and expenses paid.  The Financial Summary function will give you an instant summary of your cash flow for each month and year to date for each rental property entered.  The summary will even graph out which property is your biggest money maker.  The Miles tab allows you to log in miles driven while recording the date and location traveled to as well.  Rentals Available rounds off this application by telling you instantly which rental properties are available, allowing you to quickly advertise to craigslist âreal estate homes available for rentâ. TheLandLordApp simplifies the process of property management by putting all the necessary rental property tools in the palm of your hand. Landlord App users are no longer dependent on their PCâs at home to track and access their property management business records.Smartphone users can visit http://www.thelandlordapp.com for a full list of included management tools, exciting benefits, and time saving features.Bonus Offer: leave a review of our app and get two dollars back on the full version.  Email us after leaving a review to claim offer.By downloading and using The LandlordApp users agree to the End User License Agreement for The LandlordApp at http://www.thelandlordapp.com/end-user-agreement/Credits:Graphics - Kays graphics

reviews.title: Layout is horrible
reviews.comment: Not very user friendly. Fonts too large,  didn\'t add right with partial payment. Could go on and on. Needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: Brice Hoogenboom

reviews.title: Couldn\'t work it out
reviews.comment: Nothing made sense. Chaotic interface.
reviews.author: Andrew Cruickshank

reviews.title: Shouldn\'t be this hard!
reviews.comment: Can\'t fill in taxes, can\'t test report function, video/tutorial is not useful at all - blurry, incoherent...actually more confusing than the app itself!  I\'m sorry to say I m very disappointed and I will be uninstalling unless something miraculous occurs.  I was so looking forward to using this and then purchasing the full version.
reviews.author: Susan B

reviews.title: The GUI looks horrific
reviews.comment: This app\'s UI looks like it was made for a PC running XP. There is absolutely no worth while functionality in this app. I get that it is a lite version, but still... at least give the user some functionality.
reviews.author: Kiel Wood

reviews.title: Need multi-tenant features
reviews.comment: I love this. Would buy full version if features for multi-tenant properties were available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks like it could be good, but...
reviews.comment: App (lite) is a sample version, so it only allows one unit. This limitation does not allow enough info to be input to test out this app. I won\'t pay f/ an app, I can\'t be relatively sure I will be able to use.  Developer: At least add the ability to input 2 or 3 properties or prefill it w/ some sample data.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t enter info/data
reviews.comment: Can\'t fill any fields rendering this app useless for me (Nexus).  Won\'t pay for full version if I can\'t even test lite version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A premature software
reviews.comment: Rental received earlier not calculated and updated. Activites on event not clear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat app
reviews.comment: No complaints about the app.  I am going to upgrade to the full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost there...
reviews.comment: No one seems to have this in their app but I really need an app that will automatically add late fees when a payment hasn\'t been made for a month, then allow mass mall to invoice with late fees included.  Please allow for multiple late fee calculations as well. My properties have a late fee on 5th, 10th, and a different amount for ongoing balances
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NJRooms
reviews.comment: Convenient.  Great on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small res
reviews.comment: Does not show up the correct size on my gnex
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh got it free
reviews.comment: Didn\'t even use it seems cool just wanted to give t 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Great app to manage my rental property.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Planning to upgrade to full version!! Highly recommend for new landlords like me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: This is a good app but I paid $1.99 and still have to deal with ads. That is ridiculous.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent organizer/tool. Am considering upgrading to full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: No multi family support? That\'s pretty crappy.
reviews.author: Mike D

reviews.title: Don\'t bother.
reviews.comment: Ugly interface. Multi-unit not implemented despite patch notes. Tries to do too much, doesn\'t do any of it well.
reviews.author: Stephen Anthony

reviews.title: Curt
reviews.comment: Sweet app. Gonna download the full version.
reviews.author: A Google User
